reviewText:
I really liked the first season. Will probably buy the second when it becomes available, but whyyyyy is there no option for blu ray or even a combo pack????

There are only 10 episodes, and the humor is rather risque, but if dumb humor and sexual humor are your thing you'll probably enjoy this one.

I hope that in time this series becomes more popular so we can have more options for purchasing. The box set is very... basic.

Both Artwork and story was good. I think the story could have been better. As for the ending, wish they did a better job. Like explaining how he got the place and how did he get of the mess he got into!
